name: ADOPTION OF RENEE C. J., a minor. Appeal of LINDA I. V.

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
parties: ADOPTION OF RENEE C. J., a minor. Appeal of LINDA I. V.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each side to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Damon J. Faldowski, Washington, for appellant.
William C. Porter, Peacock, Keller, Yohe, Day & Ecker, Washington, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
406 A.2d 750
ADOPTION OF RENEE C. J., a minor. Appeal of LINDA I. V.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 25, 1979.
Decided Oct. 23, 1979.
Damon J. Faldowski, Washington, for appellant.
William C. Porter, Peacock, Keller, Yohe, Day & Ecker, Washington, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
